Neutrogena Hydro Boost Eye Gel Cream

Brand: Neutrogena

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: WATER, DIMETHICONE, GLYCERIN, CETEARYL OLIVATE, SORBITAN OLIVATE, POLYACRYLAMIDE, PHENOXYETHANOL, DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, SYNTHETIC BEESWAX, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, CARBOMER, TREHALOSE, DIMETHICONOL, CHLORPHENESIN, LAURETH-7, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, C12-14

SYNTHETIC BEESWAX, C13-14 ISOPARAFFIN, DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER, CARBOMER, TREHALOSE, DIMETHICONOL, CHLORPHENESIN, LAURETH-7, SODIUM HYALURONATE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, C12-14 PARETH-12
